title: North Country National Scenic Trail: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps         The North Country National Scenic Trail crosses seven northern states.  It begins in New York and ends in North Dakota.  This map shows the general location of the trail. It should not be used for detailed trip planning. More detailed maps are available from our partner organizations, or from the responsible land managers.       Early autumn along the North Country National Scenic Trail. Ken Howell NPS
